about:
I am an enthusiastic Data Scientist and Machine Learning Engineer with a Bachelor's degree in Electronics and Telecommunications from MCT Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Technology, Mumbai. My passion for technology and data-driven insights drives my continuous pursuit of knowledge and innovation in the field of data science and Generative AI.

Currently, I am honing my skills as an intern at MResult, where I am involved in a diverse range of projects, including a Wealth Management chatbot that performs functions such as determining the user's investment personality, tax calculation and savings advice, stock price analysis, prediction and advice, and providing financial suggestions based on the user's financial details and investment personality. My work involves integrating AI and ML solutions to deliver accurate predictions, insightful analyses, user-friendly interfaces, and creating pipelines for the models.

During my tenure at MResult, I have successfully implemented complex machine learning models and created pipelines, developed intuitive chatbot features, and contributed to the automation and optimization of various processes. My ability to translate complex technical concepts into actionable insights has been a key asset in my role.

I have also been actively engaged in extracurricular activities such as managing and organizing technical events for IETE and participating in coding challenges and competitions on platforms like LeetCode and GeeksforGeeks. These experiences have not only sharpened my technical skills but also enhanced my leadership and teamwork abilities.

Key Skills:
-Data Science & Machine Learning: Proficient in Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, and scikit-learn.
-Generative AI: Experienced in developing and fine-tuning models for diverse applications using frameworks and wrapper LLMs such as GPT-3.5, GPT4, Gemini-Pro, FinGPT, and AI models from HuggingFace.
-Software Development: Experienced in developing applications with Flask, Django, and AIogram.
-Databases: Skilled in SQL, MongoDB, ChromaDB, PineconeFAISS and Weaviate.
-Problem-Solving: Consistently solving complex DSA problems and earning recognitions, including the 100 Days Coding 2024 Badge on LeetCode and many Daily LeetCode Challenge of the Month Badges.

I am always eager to connect with like-minded professionals and explore new opportunities in the field of data science, Generative AI, and machine learning. Feel free to reach out to me for collaborations, discussions, or just a friendly chat about the latest tech!

about:
As an AI/ML Engineer passionate about building intelligent, scalable, and real-world solutions, I specialize in designing systems that push the boundaries of what's possible with modern language models and agentic workflows. My current focus lies at the cutting edge of Generative AI, Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), and autonomous AI systems.

With a strong foundation in Python and modern backend frameworks like FastAPI, I develop high-performance inference APIs that interface seamlessly with open-source LLMs such as DeepSeek, Ollama, ChatGPT, and more. My engineering philosophy is grounded in deploying robust, maintainable, and production-grade AI systems that are optimized for real-time interaction and decision-making.

My day-to-day work involves building RAG applications, crafting domain-aware LLM agents, and orchestrating multi-step pipelines using LlamaIndex, LangChain, and LangGraph. These systems are tailored for tasks like intelligent search, document understanding, multi-modal interaction, and task automation‚Äîbridging unstructured data with reasoning capabilities.

A key part of my workflow is deploying and scaling these AI services in cloud environments, especially Microsoft Azure, where I manage containerized deployments, model hosting, and CI/CD pipelines. I‚Äôve deployed LLM-based apps using Azure Functions, App Services, and Container Instances, ensuring availability, observability, and cost-effective scaling.

I‚Äôm particularly fascinated by automated AI agents‚Äîsystems that not only generate responses, but dynamically reason, reflect, and act across tools, APIs, and external environments. I‚Äôve built multi-agent systems capable of autonomous retrieval, task planning, memory retention, and user-driven customization.

Beyond implementation, I actively follow developments in open-source LLMs and AI infrastructure, contribute to community discussions, and maintain a strong focus on the user experience and architectural trade-offs in AI system design.

about:
I‚Äôm an AI Developer at E42.ai with over 6 years of professional experience building production-ready systems across Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Generative AI, and Agentic AI. My work focuses on architecting intelligent, scalable pipelines that bridge the gap between research and real-world impact.

I specialize in designing and deploying autonomous agents powered by LLMs (GPT-4, LLaMA, Mistral) using frameworks like LangChain, LangGraph, and Hugging Face. I‚Äôve implemented multi-agent RAG systems, async FastAPI microservices, and cloud-native GenAI platforms using GCP, Azure, and AWS. 
My end-to-end ownership spans everything from OCR/ICR-based document processing to LangGraph-based memory-driven agents for multimodal data.
Over the years, I‚Äôve worked on high-impact projects like:

Technically, I‚Äôm fluent in Python, SQL, TensorFlow, PyTorch, LangChain, Transformers, and MLOps tools like MLflow, Docker, Azure ML Studio, and Vertex AI. I‚Äôm also experienced in NLP, Computer Vision, Prompt Engineering, and deploying AI systems that are efficient, explainable, and scalable.

I‚Äôm deeply passionate about:

updates.postText:
Representing the #UnitedArabEmirates, a nation boldly defining global #AI #leadership, it is a profound honor to serve as a "Global AI Delegate" for the Global Alliance for Artificial Intelligence (#GAFAI).

This pivotal appointment empowers our collective pursuit of responsible, impactful artificial intelligence deployment on a global scale.

For years, I've passionately advocated for the practical and ethical adoption of AI across the #UAE and other markets, sharing insights and fostering innovation. This role provides an exceptional platform to scale those efforts globally. It's through hands-on approaches, like my recently coined concept of #PairVibeCoding designed to foster truly intuitive and collaborative #AI development ‚Äì that we #accelerate meaningful impact.

The #UAE's commitment to cultivating an environment where breakthrough AI innovation is seamlessly integrated with robust ethical frameworks is truly commendable. I am eager to contribute my expertise in scalable #GenAI solutions, advanced Agentic AI, and comprehensive AI governance to this vital endeavor.

This #partnership underscores a shared dedication to harnessing #AI's profound potential, ensuring it empowers progress built on trust and widespread benefit for all. Let's collectively shape an intelligent future that serves #humanity.

#GenAI #UAEAIVision #ResponsibleAI #GAFAI #AIEngineering #EthicalAI 
#DigitalTransformation #EthicalTech #GlobalCollaboration #OperationalExcellence #DataDrivenDecisions #GlobalAlliance #AIAdoption #Leadership Mohamed Al Marri ‚ú™ , CIPME, ITBMC Shakilla Jhungeer JOY CASE #PairVibeCoding #vibecoding #AgenticAI

Exciting update! üéâ

Thrilled to announce I've been selected as a Trusted Tester for "Gemini Diffusion" ‚Äì Google DeepMind's latest cutting-edge and advanced model.

Ready to explore and contribute to the next frontier of AI. Let's build the future!

#GeminiDiffusion #GoogleDeepMind #AI #Innovation #MachineLearning #DeepLearning #TrustedTester #Google #AGI #Testing #Gemini #LLM #agents #genai #googlecloud

üöÄ What an electrifying evening at Google Cloud Gen AI Live & Labs, Dubai yesterday!

This wasn't just an event; it was a deep dive into how Google Generative AI, Multi-Agent Systems, and Google DeepMind's cutting-edge AI trends are fundamentally reshaping industries.

For me, a standout was the brilliant Gemini live demo by Tiago Henriques, truly showcasing the future of AI. 
The session by Ziad Jammal, Country Manager, Google Cloud - UAE, was incredibly inspiring and thought-provoking ‚Äì fantastic to finally connect in person and discuss #AITransformation in the maritime industry! 
Also, Alex Rutter's session on the potential of Agents was simply brilliant.
And it was a pleasure to finally meet Mohammed Khodr - MK, Google Cloud AI Lead, in person; always inspiring to connect with you.

On the sidelines, I had a fantastic conversation on Agentic AI and its industry-reshaping potential with Ahmed Afrose, Head of Customer Engineering at Google Cloud. And a truly thought-provoking, long exchange on Vertex AI, the A2A protocol, ADK, GDC, and more with @Pradeep Singh ‚Äì incredibly insightful!

Getting hands-on with Agent Space Labs and the Agent Development Kit (ADK) with Fabrice Aubert was pure gold ‚Äì seeing multi-agent systems come to life on GCP is truly powerful.

A clear reminder: We're not waiting for the AI revolution, we're building it.

#GenAI #GoogleCloud #AgentSpace #AILeadership #MultiAgentSystems #GCP #ProductInnovation #DubaiTech #DigitalTransformation #AiLive25

In smart metering, one of the biggest challenges is Non-Communicating (NonCom) smart meters‚Äîdevices that fail to transmit data remotely due to network issues, hardware failures, configuration errors, or SIM-related problems. updates.postText:
Had a very insightful experience attending this Live Audio event...

Agenda: How to prepare for Tech Roles ?
Hosted By: Priyank Ahuja
Guest: Nikita Sharma

Some points of insight that Nikita Sharma shared:

1. Resume should be crisp (One page), to the point.

2. Make sure your resume consist of most of the keywords that are present in JD of profile you are applying for and should reflect the skills required by the company, always touch-up the resume before applying.

3. Always go for Quality over quantity. Do not try to learn everything that comes on LinkedIn posts or others are achieving. Follow your passion and polish it.

4. When preparing for tech roles, always follow your own path with your goals.

5. Get comfortable giving interviews by practicing with peers, friends or anyone who is ready to do this exercise.

6. Learn from one source and not get confused by following multiple paths together at one instance of time. (Sources : Youtube, Online Learning)

7. Clear concepts first before going for Competitive Programming.

Thanks a lot Priyank Ahuja for organising this event. 
Thanks Nikita Sharma for guiding us about getting ready for tech roles in Tech Giants.

about:
Experienced Database Administrator | 13+ Years of Expertise Across PostgreSQL, SQL Server, MySQL, Oracle & MongoDB

A seasoned Database Administrator with over 13 years of total IT experience, including 9.10+ years of specialized expertise in managing and optimizing databases at JAP-IT Data Center, Government of Jharkhand. Proficient in handling mission-critical database systems across diverse platforms, ensuring reliability, performance, and security.

Core Competencies:

Database Installation, Configuration & Upgradation: Seamless deployment and management across PostgreSQL, SQL Server, MySQL, Oracle, and MongoDB.

Migration & Patching: Expertise in planning and executing database migrations and patch updates with minimal downtime.

High Availability & Replication: Skilled in AlwaysON, AlwaysON Groups, Cluster Configuration, Master-Slave, Transactional, Logical, Streaming Replication, and HA setups.

Backup & Recovery: Robust strategies for daily, weekly, and monthly backups, along with Point-in-Time Recovery (PITR).

Performance Tuning: Proactive monitoring and tuning database performance, resolving blocking issues using Profiler, SQL Trace, and Logs.

Security & Authentication: Implementation of secure authentication mechanisms, account administration, and audit reporting.

Sharding & Replica Sets: Proficient in configuring and managing MongoDB Sharding and ReplicaSets.

Monitoring & Automation: Database health checks, automated alerting, and maintenance workflows.

Communication & Collaboration: Strong collaboration with cross-functional teams for seamless project execution.

Combining a deep understanding of database technologies with a commitment to operational excellence, I am dedicated to delivering robust, secure, and high-performing database environments.

updates.postText:
How does ResNet50 see the world? üåç 

On the left: what we see ‚Äî a typical street.
On the right: what a machine sees ‚Äî pixel-wise segmentation, with each region mapped to a class label via feature extraction and classification.

‚≠ê ResNet50, with its 50-layer deep residual blocks and skip connections, doesn‚Äôt just "see" ‚Äî it interprets. It forms the backbone for a wide range of tasks, from semantic segmentation to classification and detection. 

‚ú® I‚Äôm currently applying ResNet50 in a very different context:
leaf-level crop disease analysis. üåø

The goal: to predict current and potential plant diseases based on visible patterns and deep features, improving early diagnosis and reducing crop losses.

Stay tuned ‚Äî I‚Äôll be sharing updates as I move from model training to real-world field validation.

ü§î Meanwhile, I‚Äôm curious: 
How are you adapting general-purpose architectures like ResNet for domain-specific challenges?

Let‚Äôs connect, share methods, and maybe even collaborate! ü§ù

#ResNet50 #PlantDiseaseDetection #DeepLearningInAgri #ComputerVision #CNN #CropHealth #AIForGood #MachineLearning #LeafDisease #SmartFarming #EdgeAI
